topic1Text: A chat application where all text is written in a Star Wars-inspired style. I didn't expect text rendering in OpenGL to be that difficult. (Development time: 2 months)
topic2Text: An app that aims to detect rhythms in music. (Development Time: 2 months (I studied a lot of math))
topic3Text: A program for creating mind maps. (Development Time: 6 months)
topic4Text: An AR golf game played using mobile GPS navigation (Development Time: 2 months)
topic5Text: CSAMMA (Cosine Search Automatic Mind Map Application) is a full-stack application that automatically creates a mind map from a given website using web scraping and search terms. For example, if you enter the word 'fish' in the search field, the application generates a mind map of website domains related to the word 'fish'. (Development Time: 1 week)
topic6Text: Application that can generate assembly recommendations for computer parts based on user choices. The project was originally intended to practice design patterns, and about 12 of them have been used in the project. The application selects compatible components using compatibility data and user preferences regarding price range and computer usage. (Development Time: 4 months)
topic7Text: Application that generates a visual representation of a boolean algebra problem (Development Time: 2 weeks)
topic8Text: I am slowly building a C++ compiler. Currently I'm working on the Lexical Analyzer. Estimated develpment time is 1-2 years.
topic9Text: I'm working on a Game Engine. I am going to mostly focus on the Physics and Collision Systems since that's what I want to specialize in. Estimated development time 2-3 years. Here's a video of me working on it https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X7BUZGp3BLE&list=PLZhEXgcS2ligIduQ4VFjpyjsPAVFlyhpp
topicGamesText: I used to make games since I was 13 on Media Molecules game making platforms. Simple things are easier to program in dreams than using a programming language, but complex mechanics are harder to implement. Some of my games would get selected by Media Molecule to highlight unique or impressive games. (Below some reviews of the games)
goodToKow: Response time is likely to be relatively short
